question: Can you name the five Great Lakes between Canada and the U.S.?
possible_answers: A. Lake Toronto, Lake Michigan, Lake Mexico, Lake Ontario, Lake St. Louis
B. Lake Superior, Lake Michigan, Lake Huron, Lake Erie, Lake Ontario
C. Lake Michigan, Lake Victoria, Lake Mexico, Lake Ontario, Lake St. Louis
main_question: Can you name the five Great Lakes between Canada and the U.S.?
answer: B. Lake Superior, Lake Michigan, Lake Huron, Lake Erie, Lake Ontario
explanatory_sentence: There are five Great Lakes located between Ontario and the United States: Lake Ontario, Lake Erie, Lake Huron, Lake Michigan (in the U.S.A.) and Lake Superior, the largest freshwater lake in the world.
